About the Company: Gujarat Petrosynthese (GPL), Polymer Blends & Alloys Division is an ISO 9001- 2000 certified company engaged in manufacturing Polymer Blends & Alloys, Specialty grade compounds with Engineering Plastics to meet demanding needs for specific applications.The company successfully commissioned India`s first polybutene unit and marketed polybutenes under the PETROVIS brand name within the country and abroad.The product range of the company includes Synolac (ABS),Synofin (PP),Blends & Alloys,Synonate(PC/ABS),Synonate (PC),Synolac (PVC),Synofin (PC/PO),Synolate(PC/PBT),Synol(POM),Synsan(SAN) and Synlon (Nylon6 & Nylon66).
